website_summaries.verdict: A quality, affordable lighting option to spice up any TV, computer or desk.
pros: The SPE lights are easy to install
Sets up with simple adhesive strips and USB plug in
Included remote can switch between multiple color settings and dimming options
You can liven up the room when playing music from your TV or computer, or set a calm mood for a movie night in
The light strips themselves feel durable and seem to be made from quality materials
For the low cost, these LED strips are hard to pass up
cons: Once the lighting is stuck onto the TV or computer it is difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME to add that extra glow to your PC monitor, but remote controls other RF lights
customer_reviews.text: ok lets get the con out of the way.. this remote controls and uses the same RF as the lights on my 50" TV, and its a good 30ft away through a wall, and i am facing the opposite direction, and yet i can barely control the lights on my tv with its remote, from 5 ft away. go figure that one out. i am so glad i got this though, i have an HP 27" monitor and i love adding this to the back of the monitor. the 39"/1m light strip is long enough to go across the top(back) of the monitor and 3/4 of the way down each side.
customer_reviews.author: PaulB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small desk set-up
customer_reviews.text: We live in a small house and my computer desk is in our bedroom. Sometimes I need to work late, and I don't want to disturb my wife, so I bought these as an alternative to a desk lamp so I can see my keyboard. I mounted them under my monitor so they light up my desk directly below the screen. Being able to choose different colors and adjust the brightness is awesome. Also, I was able to trim it to length by cutting at the contact points between two LEDs. If I ever need anything like this again I wont hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whitehurst

customer_reviews.title: Too temperamental
customer_reviews.text: The blue light immediately stopped working, within 2 minutes of having it plugged in. So now instead of 6 color options, I have only red and green. Not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived in good condition. I got it all setup and it ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in good condition. I got it all setup and it looks wonderful. There's only one problem. It didn't come with a remote. I purchased the one with the remote but unfortunately it wasn't there. i checked the only bag but only the actual led strip was inside. I'm a little disappointed that i'm not going to be able to use the other colors. As of right now the color is blue. I guess i'll either return it and buy it again hoping the remote comes with it or stick with the color for the time being. Other than that, it works just fine. A shame indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this kit. Simple and effective. My TV is about 8 inches away from the wall and the wall is still bright and illuminated by this kit. Lots of options on the remote as well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Doran

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but good solution. The setup up is easy. USB power cable and remote are included in the price. Remote works well for controlling mode and lighting. Only wish it had a rainbow (single light color) opposed to entire strand setting as.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for night owls, or those who prefer dimmed/colored lighting
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I have it placed behind my tv so I’m able to watch tv or play video games with my lights out while having the LED strip on, it provides great background light for that, plus it when in its brightest setting it provides the entire room with a good amount of light. the only knock on it is that the strip is pretty flimsy, but that wouldn’t stop me from recommending it to someone, it’s a must have, especially if you like non-tradition lighting in your room
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Setup as desk light.
customer_reviews.text: Set up as a desk light on one of my shelves. Works awesome. Wish the cable was just a little longer. Will probably get another one for the other shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Santino Raimondi

customer_reviews.title: Bad Remote & Product
customer_reviews.text: It has only been about 1-2 weeks and the remote has already stopped working. So now I am stuck with having to unplug the lights and with the blinking blue lights as I cannot change them. Not to mention that I used tape to secure it as the adhesion is very weak. There are many other products out there like this, buy them instead. Update: They have completely stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have set up solely around my gaming monitor so the colors bounce off my wall and I think it looks great, some colors are better than others and I do wish there was more in between colors but for the price I paid I can’t be mad. Only thing I have to say is that mine randomly turns on and I can’t figure out why and it’s a little creepy
customer_reviews.author: Adam Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap light for your tv or monitor but color is disappointing. Pink is more like light pink and so on. If you care about better looking color avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: JPark91

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Loving this product. I bought it for my home office and enjoy it more and more each day. Like the selection of colors and patterns.
customer_reviews.author: wendy d camp

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Completely changed my 4K TV. Now watching the TV in low light doesnt give me a head ache
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: One worked for a day then quit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two small/short strips of the LEDs to mount under a shelf on my desk at work. Initially both strips worked just fine but when I took them to work the next day to stick them up, one of them would not turn on. We'll see how long the other one lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Uh Burt

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Colorful LED Strip Lights
customer_reviews.text: Awesome LED strip lights. Great variety of colors. I used it with my computer setup. These lights make my room more colorful. And it's super adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Maksym Demyda

customer_reviews.title: Great Showcase Item
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 2 tier desk under the shelf. It creates a great mood setting for your laptop or as a writing desk. The remote control is nice, because you can choose what color you want but also cycle through different modes depending on your preference.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bernath

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a light but you have no control. The remote does not work and the lights go to random mode whenever you turn the tv off and on. So if you love a flashing light all the time this is your light but you have no control over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Cheap. Used it behind our entertainment center. Some lights are not to its true color that it shows on the remote- but we still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lights are very dim even on highest setting so I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: chris harper

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gadget doe the Value
customer_reviews.text: This product is as advertised, came as promised, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Holds well
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. Easy to install. Remote is straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyBuilt4CubanLinx

customer_reviews.title: Remote Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: After plugging the LED Strip into a powered USB port, they turned on in the Blue (static) setting. The remote does not seem to work though. I swapped the battery, and it still does not work. The color was nice, but I really wish the remote functioned.
customer_reviews.author: EagleEye2038

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just as described. Color changes and you can have a transition mode that cycles through the colors, that's how I usually keep mine. It brings a pop and good vibe in the area. Great for gaming too
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very bright. Love all the color varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Jozeee

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this. Doesn't work. Don't buy. It's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anakin Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre product. Clearly cheaply made, but that's what I expected at this price. Rf remote doesn't work at all, so the light is just a steady blue, no way to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Dosent even wanna work anymore 2 minutes after I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, I swear it was working the minute I got it. Set it up then all of a sudden the lights quit flickering and the remote isn't even responsive anymore.. Figured why it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets. One for the back of my TV and one for the bar area. Just so others are aware one remote controls both sets if they're close enough together.
customer_reviews.author: Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, remote has decent distance, colours are nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Mick B

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, but works great if in a safe spot
customer_reviews.text: It works well and was inexpensive . Had to get a second one because the first one’s USB portion broke way too easily (cats can be a pain sometimes). Just keep in mind it’s fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mamula

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough.
customer_reviews.text: They’re not bright at all. Used them to highlight a gaming desk. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: These could stand to throw a bit more light but they function as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Sokolovic

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Ignore the bad reviews because it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: these lights would be dope but they suck
customer_reviews.text: The lights stayed on one color setting and wouldn't change. It was stuck on strobe.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Remote ruined within 8 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Lights are nice but remote already doesn’t work red light at the top of remote lights up but colors don’t change.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas Hallal

customer_reviews.title: Light's
customer_reviews.text: Gave to grandson to place around computer monitor. He really likes them slot.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

product_meta.title: SPE USB Bias Lighting with RF Remote Control for HDTV - Small (39in / 1m) - Multi-Color RGB - USB LED Backlight Strip with Dimmer for Flat Screen TV LCD, Desktop Monitors, Kitchen Cabinets
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: Premium USB LED Strip Light Kit with RF Remote Control. USB bias lighting, 3M adhesive backing and USB for easy plug-in.

PEEL & STICK: Quickly light up tables, TVs and other furniture in minutes! Just clean the surface thoroughly, peel and stick! The LED Light Strip is powered by any USB port. Repurpose an old USB phone charger or plug it into your computer/laptop/tv!

CREATE A BEAUTIFUL VIEWING EXPERIENCE: With LED bias lighting, you create sharper images and color contrast while adding beautiful TV ambient lighting to your surroundings. The SPE Backlight for TV creates an environment that makes your friends and family want you to be the one to host viewing parties.

REDUCE EYE STRAIN IN CHILDREN & ADULTS: With increasing screen time, eyestrain and headaches have become more and more common. Bias lights save your eyes and prevent unwanted headaches in both children and adults by reducing the contrast between the brightness of the TV and the surrounding room.
12 Month Warranty - SPE products are all covered with an industry standard warranty on parts and replacements. Please reach out to our support email assistance.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
